text.p: These are significant stories in the Nigerian press on Thursday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Federal government launches economic recovery campaign code-named "Vision 2010."
- Government to boost food production with eight billion naira, says finance minister Anthony Ani.
- Seven killed as Shi'ites Moslems riot in Kaduna, northern Nigeria.
- Nigeria Airways plans joint venture operation with foreign and local airlines, says aviation minister Air Commodore Ita Udo-Imeh.
- Benin deports 2,000 Nigerians for illegal entry.
- Central Bank to stop retail banking from next January, military ruler General Sani Abacha says at economic summit in Abuja.
- Fifteen killed in riot by radical Moslems in Kaduna, northern Nigeria.
